UpdateSourceArgs: -c "cd nwnee/server && ReleaseVersion=$(wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/urothis/nwserver/refs/heads/main/version.json | jq -r .stable) && ReleaseVersion=\"${ReleaseVersion%.*}-${ReleaseVersion##*.}\" && wget -qO nwnee.zip https://nwn.beamdog.net/downloads/nwnee-dedicated-$ReleaseVersion.zip && unzip -uq nwnee.zip -d . >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f nwnee.zip >/dev/null 2>&1 && chmod +x bin/linux-x86/nwserver-linux"
